person.topic: If the eight philosophies of avatarhood combine into and are made from truth, love & courage...More?What one thing creates and is created by all truths, all love & all courage?Oh.

person.name: Juliet
person.topic: Seek ye to know how the eight virtues form into the three principles.Know ye this?Now the one!Seek it!
Seek ye to know what one thing the three principles of virtue combine into!

person.name: Jester Twin
person.topic: A jester needs a good bard!
Our bard is very good.Dost thou like the music?Then you should go to Britain for there lives the best!A shame, we do!

person.name: a guard
person.topic: I guard the castle and my liege!
A guard must be a valiant warrior!Art thou the most valiant warrior?Then thou should be a guard!Still flee not from battle!

person.name: Le Chef
person.description: A person with a white hat.
person.topic: Well.. All but my finger, which I cut!
Food, glorious food, to cook is my life!
Cooking is a practiced art.Do you eat?Then thou should try my soup!Then thou must be a spiritualist!

person.name: a reaper
person.topic: Not so good, no one to eat in here!
There is a thing which can kill many!
Knowledge of it is found at Buccaneer's Den!Will you seek this thing?It brings great power!Then thou must be stupid.

person.name: a nameless prisoner
person.topic: Here I pay for my crimes!Are you a pirate?You may never complete thy quests, for evil makes not an avatar!I hope that this is true!

person.name: Zorin
person.topic: I am here to help thee.
Seek: the Lycaeum, Empath Abbey, Serpent's Castle!Wilt thou go hither?Find therein all named Antos and ask of the bell, book, and candle!Alas.

person.name: a guard
person.topic: I guard the castle and all within.
The castle is fair and strong!Do you seek Lord British?He is on the upper level in the throne room.He will aid you if you are in need!

person.name: Water
person.topic: There are three altar rooms which connect the bottom levels of all eight dungeons!

person.name: Shawn
person.description: A shepherdess both strong and beautiful.
person.topic: I come from a proud city.Art thou proud?Hmmm.My towne was destroyed for its pride. The ruins lie on an isle at lat-K'J" long-L'L"!

person.name: Seesha
person.topic: Britannia.Fight ye for Britannia?Then seek out the smith named Zircon in Minoc for he made the mystic arms, only they will save thee in the abyss!Hmm.

person.name: Chuckles
person.topic: Welcome unto the castle Britannia!Hast thou an ankh?Then enter in peace!Then why art thou here?
Speak ye unto the waters of the well and ask of altars!

person.name: a guard
person.topic: We guard the castle and its treasures.
That is not your business.Do you mean to steal?I believe you will find that an unfruitful venture.Then please leave at once!

person.name: Sheila
person.topic: I search for the inner light.
Seek inner light in the shrines!
Runes are needed to enter shrines!Dost thou know of mantra?Good.The mantra are chants needed to focus thy thoughts while meditating.

person.name: Landri
person.topic: I am here to warn thee!
I am fine, but thou must go back!
Once thou enters thou may not return whence thee came!Wilt thou go on?Then thou art doomed!That is good.
